statements: SELECT * FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, return_date FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, return_reason FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE return_reason = 'Defective Product';
SELECT * FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, return_date, product_id FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(return_id) AS total_returns FROM ReturnsAndExchanges GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%' AND customer_id IN (100, 101) ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM ReturnsAndExchanges WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT return_id, product_id FROM returns WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY return_id DESC;
SELECT return_reason, return_date FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT exchange_id, product_id, exchange_date FROM exchanges WHERE product_id = 3 ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason, return_date FROM returns WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_id < 100 ORDER BY return_id ASC, return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY original_purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT exchange_id, product_id, DATE_FORMAT(exchange_date, '%Y/%m/%d') AS formatted_exchange_date FROM exchanges ORDER BY product_id, exchange_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_exchanges FROM exchanges GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_exchanges > 1 ORDER BY total_exchanges DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM Returns;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM Returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM Returns;
SELECT return_id, order_id, product_id, return_reason FROM Returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT exchange_id, original_order_id, new_order_id, product_id, exchange_reason FROM Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_id DESC;
SELECT r.return_id, r.order_id, r.product_id, r.return_reason, d.reason_description FROM Returns r JOIN Dissatisfaction_Reasons d ON r.return_reason = d.reason_id;
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' AND product_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_reason, exchange_date FROM exchanges WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY exchange_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT return_id, return_date, notes FROM Returns ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT reason_description, resolution FROM ReturnsReasons WHERE reason_code = 2
